title: Amygdala TDP-43 pathology is associated with behavioural dysfunction and ferritin accumulation in amyotrophic lateral sclerosis.
details: OM Rifai, FM Waldron, J O'Shaughnessy, FL Read… - bioRxiv, 2024
abstract: Background: Cognitive and behavioural symptoms associated with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis and frontotemporal spectrum disorders (ALSFTSD) are thought to be driven, at least in part, by the pathological accumulation of TDP-43. Methods: Here …
